name: Force Staff
description: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

abilities.name: Force
abilities.description: Pushes the target unit in the direction they are facing.
notes: Can be cast on Homing Missile
Cannot be cast on Ward-type units
Cannot be cast on debuff immune enemies, but can be cast on debuff immune allies
Cannot be cast on leashed units
Does not disable the target, they can still attack, cast abilities and items, and turn during it
Does not interrupt channeling abilities of the affected target
The direction is determined upon cast, it does not adapt if the target should turn while being moved
Can move the target over impassable terrain
Destroys trees within a 100 radius around the target
Roshan cannot be moved. Attempting to do so wastes the mana and cooldown
Can be cast on, but does not move units affected by Flaming Lasso, Black Hole, Chronosphere, or Duel
Cannot push units through temporary fences like Kinetic Field or Arena of Blood

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
The item's attributes grant 120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
10 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes
4.5 main attack damage to Universal heroes
